::KitKat::

She smiled,"Thank you for understanding. I don't know why you don't 
like him. He has done so much for us. He has proven himself to us. 
But I shall keep your comments in mind." She smiled,"And yeah, that 
was ou first fight."  She then straightened up and said to him in a 
stern voice. "But don't let it happen again. I cannot fight with you 
and lead at the same time. OK?"

She turned and walked out and went to Phobia. "Aright. We have to 
locate Magetron first. Any ideas on where he may be hiding? Also, We 
need to find more troops it that is possable."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He did as she said.
> "I'll do as I'm ordered. Froma command point of view, your right. I 
just
> dont like him much." He looked away.
> "Heh. I believe thats are first fight." He kissed her on the cheak.
> 
> OOC: I have included a pic of my RL self. I dont know if it will 
come
> through correctly though. I just got my scanner and the software 
today.
